 Promotion for prepaid subcribers recharge account in 2.2012 
 1.  Eligible subscribers 
 
 
 Prepaid subscribers recharge account ( active, inactive, deactive, at the time of keeping number subcriber, in the first 10 recharge cards period). 
 
 
 Postpaid subscribers change to prepaid subscribers can join this promotion. 
 
 
 2.  Benefits 
 
 
 Up to 50% EXTRA top-up credits with every top up : 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Top-up card 
 
 
 Bonus

 KM 3 (online)

 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948;
